name: sooty
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
covered in soot (= a black powder produced when coal, wood, etc. is burned): There were a lot of flames and a lot of thick, black, sooty smoke. Sooty particles that lodge in the lungs are harmful.
black, or the colour of soot (= a black powder produced when coal, wood, etc. is burned): The film is shot in sooty black and white. I admired the sooty black coats. See
soot
